languages.text: "Последние месяцы выдались тяжелыми для подотчетных мне людей — моих глаз и ушей, разбросанных по всему Простору Коронус. Варп-возмущения, безумие астропатов, исчезающие в Имматериуме корабли... многие соглядатаи и контактеры пропали бесследно либо погибли в том или ином бедствии. Тем не менее, мне удалось наладить сообщение с ключевыми... лицами, способными сообщать о надвигающихся на нас угрозах, в том числе — и рейдах ксеносов".

traits.locale_text: "Последние месяцы выдались тяжелыми для подотчетных мне людей — моих глаз и ушей, разбросанных по всему Простору Коронус. Варп-возмущения, безумие астропатов, исчезающие в имматериуме корабли... многие соглядатаи и контактеры пропали бесследно либо погибли в том или ином бедствии. Тем не менее, мне удалось наладить сообщение с ключевыми... лицами, способными сообщать о надвигающихся на нас угрозах, в том числе — и рейдах ксеносов".

languages.text: "The last few months have been difficult for the people who report to me — my eyes and ears scattered throughout the Koronus Expanse. Warp disturbances, Astropaths overcome with madness, ships disappearing in the Immaterium... many of my observers and contacts have gone dark or have been killed by some calamity or other. Still, I managed to establish communication with some key... individuals who were able to warn me about incoming threats, including xenos raids."
languages.original_text: "Последние месяцы выдались тяжелыми для подотчетных мне людей — моих глаз и ушей, разбросанных по всему Простору Коронус. Варп-возмущения, безумие астропатов, исчезающие в Имматериуме корабли... многие соглядатаи и контактеры пропали бесследно либо погибли в том или ином бедствии. Тем не менее, мне удалось наладить сообщение с ключевыми... лицами, способными сообщать о надвигающихся на нас угрозах, в том числе — и рейдах ксеносов".

traits.locale_text: "The last few months have been difficult for the people who report to me — my eyes and ears scattered throughout the Koronus Expanse. Warp disturbances, Astropaths overcome with madness, ships disappearing in the Immaterium... many of my observers and contacts have gone dark or were killed by some calamity or other. Still, I managed to establish communication with some key... individuals who could warn me about incoming threats, including xenos raids."

"The last few months have been difficult for the people who report to me — my eyes and ears scattered throughout the Koronus Expanse. Warp disturbances, Astropaths overcome with madness, ships disappearing in the Immaterium... many of my observers and contacts have gone dark or have been killed by some calamity or other. Still, I managed to establish communication with some key... individuals who were able to warn me about incoming threats, including xenos raids."

languages.text: “整个科罗努斯扩区都有我的耳目。对我的线人而言，过去几个月很难熬。来自亚空间的干扰、发了疯的星语者、在亚空间中消失的飞船……我与许多监察官和联络人都失去了联系，他们也可能是死于灾害，或是被别的什么东西杀害了。不过，我还是想方设法与一部分关键……成员……取得了联系。他们警告我即将到来的威胁，其中包括异形的袭击。”
languages.original_text: "The last few months have been difficult for the people who report to me — my eyes and ears scattered throughout the Koronus Expanse. Warp disturbances, Astropaths overcome with madness, ships disappearing in the Immaterium... many of my observers and contacts have gone dark or have been killed by some calamity or other. Still, I managed to establish communication with some key... individuals who were able to warn me about incoming threats, including xenos raids."

traits.locale_text: “整个科罗努斯扩区都有我的耳目。对我的线人而言，过去几个月很难熬。来自亚空间的干扰、发了疯的星语者、在亚空间中消失的飞船……我与许多监察官和联络人都失去了联系，他们也可能是死于灾害，或是被别的什么东西杀害了。不过，我还是想方设法与一部分关键……成员……取得了联系。他们警告我即将到来的威胁，其中包括异形的袭击。”

languages.text: «Los últimos meses han pasado factura a la gente que me informa: mis ojos y oídos en la Extensión de Koronus. Perturbaciones de la disformidad, astrópatas enloquecidos, naves devoradas por el Inmaterio... muchos de mis observadores han interrumpido el contacto o han muerto a manos de una u otra calamidad. Sin embargo, aún conservo el contacto con algunos... individuos clave que me han avisado de amenazas inminentes, incluyendo incursiones xenos».
languages.original_text: "The last few months have been difficult for the people who report to me — my eyes and ears scattered throughout the Koronus Expanse. Warp disturbances, Astropaths overcome with madness, ships disappearing in the Immaterium... many of my observers and contacts have gone dark or have been killed by some calamity or other. Still, I managed to establish communication with some key... individuals who were able to warn me about incoming threats, including xenos raids."

traits.locale_text: «Los últimos meses han pasado factura a la gente que me informa: mis ojos y oídos en la Extensión de Koronus. Perturbaciones de la disformidad, astrópatas enloquecidos, naves devoradas por el Inmaterio... muchos de mis observadores han interrumpido el contacto o han muerto a manos de una u otra calamidad. Sin embargo, aún conservo el contacto con algunos... individuos clave que me han avisado de amenazas inminentes, incluyendo incursiones xenos».

languages.text: 「この2、3か月は私に報告を上げる人員にとっては苦労多き日々でした――私の目と耳はコロヌス・エクスパンス全域に散り散りになってしまったのです。〈歪み〉の乱れ、狂気に倒れる感応通信官、非物質世界へと消える船…私の監視員と情報筋が闇に消えたり災害で亡くなったりという道を辿りました。それでもどうにか、重要人物…異種族の襲撃を含む、来る脅威を私に警告してくれた者たちとの連絡体制は作りました」
languages.original_text: "The last few months have been difficult for the people who report to me — my eyes and ears scattered throughout the Koronus Expanse. Warp disturbances, Astropaths overcome with madness, ships disappearing in the Immaterium... many of my observers and contacts have gone dark or have been killed by some calamity or other. Still, I managed to establish communication with some key... individuals who were able to warn me about incoming threats, including xenos raids."

traits.locale_text: 「この2、3か月は私に報告を上げる人員にとっては苦労多き日々でした――私の目と耳はコロヌス・エクスパンス全域に散り散りになってしまったのです。〈歪み〉の乱れ、狂気に倒れる感応通信官、非物質世界へと消える船…私の監視員と情報筋が闇に消えたり災害で亡くなったりという道を辿りました。それでもどうにか、重要人物…異種族の襲撃を含む、来る脅威を私に警告してくれた者たちとの連絡体制は作りました」

languages.text: "Die letzten Monate waren schwierig für die Leute, die mir Bericht erstatten – meine Augen und Ohren überall in der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Warp-Störungen, Wahnsinn bei den Astropathen, im Immaterium verschwundene Schiffe ... viele meiner Beobachter und Kontakte sind untergetaucht oder wurden von irgendeiner Gefahr getötet. Dennoch konnte ich den Kontakt zu einigen wichtigen ... Einzelpersonen halten, die mich vor nahenden Bedrohungen warnten, darunter auch Xenos-Überfälle."
languages.original_text: "The last few months have been difficult for the people who report to me — my eyes and ears scattered throughout the Koronus Expanse. Warp disturbances, Astropaths overcome with madness, ships disappearing in the Immaterium... many of my observers and contacts have gone dark or have been killed by some calamity or other. Still, I managed to establish communication with some key... individuals who were able to warn me about incoming threats, including xenos raids."

traits.locale_text: "Die letzten Monate waren schwierig für die Leute, die mir Bericht erstatten – meine Augen und Ohren überall in der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Warp-Störungen, Wahnsinn bei den Astropathen, im Immaterium verschwundene Schiffe ... viele meiner Beobachter und Kontakte sind untergetaucht oder wurden von irgendeiner Gefahr getötet. Dennoch konnte ich den Kontakt zu einigen wichtigen ... Einzelpersonen halten, die mich vor nahenden Bedrohungen warnten, darunter auch Xenos-Überfälle."

languages.text: « Ces derniers mois ont été particulièrement difficiles pour mes yeux et mes oreilles éparpillés aux quatre coins des Étendues de Koronus. Entre les perturbations dans le Warp, les astropathes frappés de folie et les vaisseaux qui disparaissent dans l'Immaterium, bon nombre de mes agents ont rompu tout contact ou ont été victimes de l'une ou l'autre de ces calamités. Je suis néanmoins parvenu à établir des communications avec certains... individus clés, dira-t-on, qui ont pu m'informer sur des menaces imminentes, incluant des raids xénos. »
languages.original_text: "The last few months have been difficult for the people who report to me — my eyes and ears scattered throughout the Koronus Expanse. Warp disturbances, Astropaths overcome with madness, ships disappearing in the Immaterium... many of my observers and contacts have gone dark or have been killed by some calamity or other. Still, I managed to establish communication with some key... individuals who were able to warn me about incoming threats, including xenos raids."

traits.locale_text: « Ces derniers mois ont été particulièrement difficiles pour mes yeux et mes oreilles éparpillés aux quatre coins des Étendues de Koronus. Entre les perturbations dans le Warp, les astropathes frappés de folie et les vaisseaux qui disparaissent dans l'Immaterium, bon nombre de mes agents ont rompu tout contact ou ont été victimes de l'une ou l'autre de ces calamités. Je suis néanmoins parvenu à établir des communications avec certains... individus clés, dira-t-on, qui ont pu m'informer sur des menaces imminentes, incluant des raids xénos. »

languages.text: "Son birkaç ay, Koronus Enginliği'ndeki gözüm ve kulağım olma görevini sürdüren adamlarım için epey zor geçti. Öteboyut bozunumları, deliliğe kapılan Astropatlar, Tindiyar'da kaybolan gemiler... Gözlemcilerimin ve iletişimde olduğum kişilerin birçoğu ile ya irtibatım koptu ya da çeşitli felaketler nedeniyle öldüler. Yine de kilit önem taşıyan bazılarıyla iletişimi sağlayabildim, onlar da beni yaklaşan tehlikelere karşı uyardı. Bu tehlikeler arasında zeno akınları da var."
languages.original_text: "The last few months have been difficult for the people who report to me — my eyes and ears scattered throughout the Koronus Expanse. Warp disturbances, Astropaths overcome with madness, ships disappearing in the Immaterium... many of my observers and contacts have gone dark or have been killed by some calamity or other. Still, I managed to establish communication with some key... individuals who were able to warn me about incoming threats, including xenos raids."

traits.locale_text: "Son birkaç ay, görevleri benim Koronus Enginliği'ndeki gözüm ve kulağım olmak olan emrimdeki kişiler için oldukça zor geçti. Öteboyut bozunumları, deliliğe kapılan Astropatlar, Tindiyar'da kaybolan gemiler... Gözlemcilerimin ve iletişimde olduğum kişilerin birçoğu ile ya irtibatım koptu, ya da çeşitli felaketler nedeniyle bu kişiler öldü. Yine de kilit önem taşıyan bazılarıyla iletişimi sağladım ve onlar da beni yaklaşan tehlikeler konusunda uyarmayı başardı. Bu tehlikelerin arasında zeno akınları da var."
